title: Where can I buy the Master's Pass?
body: I see there was a Master's Pass but did it get taken down? Can I not buy the pass? I would really like to buy the pass so I can work on getting the Ashe skin.

replies.body: The Master Pass was only available while the World's Championships were going on. Since that has since ended and those missions were only designed for that time, the pass and missions have both ended.
